name: Inner State
description:
State Game!

For every skill that you learn, you spent your time that you could've used to learn another thing.

Balance and choice is what life is all about, and this game is not different. 

State game is an action RPG focused on fast paced battle where you have different battle states with different skills.

Every state has it's advantages but you'll have to sacrifice some stats in order to gain the other ones.

This game was made for the ENJAM 2021. A GameJam made by the CNAM-ENJMIN students where the subject was "Sacrifices must be made"

My idea was to have the player choose between states for parts of the game and thus sacrifice some stats in order to play with the character that he felt more confortable or the one that was best adapted to the situation.

Controls: -Arrow Keys to move

                      -"Q" key to attack

                      -Spacebar to change state, when you're allowed

Game Design and Level Design: Daniel Cucalon

Character design and Art: Daniel Cucalon

Programmer: Daniel Cucalon

Environmental Artist: Armando Montero

End Game music: Ricardo Cuello

SFX: SF Audio Guild

Battle Music: PeriTune
